Title: People Will Talk
Writer: Joseph L. Mankiewicz (written for the screen by), Curt Goetz (play)
Actors: Cary Grant, Jeanne Crain, Finlay Currie, Hume Cronyn
Plot: Successful and well-liked, Dr. Noah Praetorius becomes the victim of a witch hunt at the hands of Professor Elwell, who disdains Praetorius's unorthodox medical views and also questions his relationship with the mysterious, ever-present Mr. Shunderson. Fuel is added to the fire when Praetorius befriends young Deborah Higgins, who has become suicidal at the prospect of having a baby by her ex boyfriend, a military reservist who was called up for service in the Korean War and killed in action.
